case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_address_found_1: Bates Well Road and Locomotive Rock
case_circumstances:
Border Patrol Agent on foot discovered the cranium, mandible, and cervical vertebrae on 21 November 2002.
Additional skeletal remains were found on 19 January 2004 scattered in desert. Both accessions were located in remote desert areas.  DNA analyses linked the two accessions, thus information from NamUs UP #6740 has now been merged into this NamUs file.
